titles.title: Simple Savings Tax Relief Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income certain interest amounts received by individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. Simple Savings Tax Relief Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $400 (twice such amount on a joint return) of interest income annually. Provides for an inflation adjustment to such amount.
